website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic treat and supplement, ZuPreem’s Pure Fun mix will promote excitement as your parrot gleefully forages through the apples, chili peppers, and grapes to grab their favorite pieces.
pros: Peas, corn, pistachios, bananas, pineapple, and papaya are the first 6 ingredients
Huge variety mix of healthy bits
cons: This treat-packed mix is intended to be a no more than 30% of your parrot’s diet

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS IF YOU WANT WHAT YOU ORDERED.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the "Pure Fun" mix a couple of times, my green check really likes it, and I've eaten it and it tastes okay. However I am rating this with a single star because although I ordered "Pure Fun" I was sent "Sensible Seed". Amazon seemed to deal with that return recognizing that it was the incorrect item. The problem is the replacement item I was sent was another order of "Sensible Seed". My bird is super unhappy with this mix, the seeds are far to large for his beak.
customer_reviews.author: The Sequoyah Guy

customer_reviews.title: ... sun conure were sorting out the bits they didn't like (the peas)
customer_reviews.text: At first the lovebird and sun conure were sorting out the bits they didn't like (the peas). Then I added a teaspoon of water and a little bit of Roudy bush, now it's their favorite. They also get seeds, Roudy bush, Nutriberries, Avi cakes, I just rotate it so they see something different.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perdichizzi

customer_reviews.title: Zupreem is a good product regardless of flavor you select!!!
customer_reviews.text: My birds are still getting use to this, however they are provided Zupreem fruit and that is 50% of their diet, but they are at least trying it out. I've tried other Zupreem flavors over the years but this is the first time it was different in size and they are not throwing it out so that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie-Q

customer_reviews.title: good food. good quality.
customer_reviews.text: this food is great. my bird loves it, I can tell because he only throws half of it on the ground for me to sweep while laughing out loud. He usually throws all of his food on the ground in a passive aggressive nature. Food is quality. looks fresh. makes me confident that he will at least eat some before joyfully tossing off his perch.
customer_reviews.author: Anamarie

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Always trusted Zupreem diets for my birds and was happy to see this addition. At first my African Grey had "pure fun" picking his goodies out of his dish and flinging them to the bottom of his cage. This is the second bag I bought and notice less rejects. It is a good variety of foods for his choosing. I would love to have it available locally.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vega

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves it and it's so convenient ordering from Amazon coming straight to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Altenwalder

customer_reviews.title: Picky Parrot
customer_reviews.text: I feed my Umbrella cockatoo ZuPreem. I always feed at least two brands (I use Harrison's and ZuPreem) of pellets to make sure that he remains willing to accept pellets as food. I decided to give Pure Fun a try as an add-in. I was a bit wary about it since in the past dried fruits especially were rejected and tossed. Pure Fun worked though. I add a bit to his regular pellets and he seems to enjoy Pure Fun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schneck

customer_reviews.title: Great option for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a 6 year old Orange Winged Amazon two years ago and he is an extremely picky eater. I purchased ZuPreem Pure Fun in hopes of giving him a better balanced diet with a wide variety to help keep him from getting bored. This has helped so much! He no longer has excessive beak flaking from vitamin deficiency and has not become overweight. Along with a balanced fresh regiment, he's become a much happier bird.
customer_reviews.author: emilyb

customer_reviews.title: They like and I like less mess and waste than with ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon for making Zupreem ineternet available. We live in the mountains not close to mass shopping. Being able to have this sent in to us makes a big difference in how the parrots eat! They like and I like less mess and waste than with seed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Dowd

customer_reviews.title: WOW – PARROT APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: Our finicky Lilac Crested Amazon Parrot adores the fruit flavored pellets but we introduced this food to her today and she dove in with great enthusiasm! Happy parrot = happy family. We recommend this food – you will SEE all the yummies your fuzzy family member will love.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.FieldsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Picky Senegal approved
customer_reviews.text: Our Senegal is a picky little guy. He usually sits in his bowl and throws his food out of his cage. It’s very frustrating. I’ve tried many different types of food. This one he approves. He hasn’t thrown any food to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Boop

customer_reviews.title: Parrot loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Cockatoo loves this pellet blend with the bits of fruit in it. The package was smaller than I had hoped for the money it cost but because he loves it I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My African Grey LOvES this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My Congo African Grey absolutely loves this food. Except for the Orange ones. Not sure why but she will NOT eat those little round ones. She east the grape shaped ones first, then the red ones, then the green and lastly the yellow. when I can I Buy in bulk, the price is much better. but in between times I pick up these bags. they last about 2 months with my grey.
customer_reviews.author: Sarconastic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Not safe to feed
customer_reviews.text: I received bag of food and it does not look fresh. I don't believe it is safe to feed my bird. I believe the no return policy should not apply if item if defective.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great foraging mix
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect foraging mix for parrots. I give this to my parrots at least twice per week. Sometimes, as just a foraging mix, and other times I blend it with their food. Its also very nutricious. Now granted..it is a bit pricey. But definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff h

customer_reviews.title: A nutritious treat for your feathered companion.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my african grey was losing weight. Since I already use the ZuPreem pellets, I had great confidence in the brand. He loved it. I have been giving this to him as an extra treat and he is sooo happy. Your bird will love this treat.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: chloe says , YUUUUKYY !
customer_reviews.text: Our Chloe (AFRICAN GREY) hates this food , way too much PEAS (SHE HATES PEAS). Also too many red peppers , she throws them out , for the dogs and they wont eat them !
customer_reviews.author: Ron R. Jacomen

customer_reviews.title: Love the fruit.
customer_reviews.text: My Panamanian Amazon doesn't care for the dried peas, but she seems to enjoy the fruits very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of parrot food
customer_reviews.text: ZuPreen is a good balance for your parrot and diverse in each of the different kinds of ZuPreen bag, It took time for them to get use to it because I did cold turkey and if they were hungry they had to try it. It is the only food I give them. Love that ZuPreen.
customer_reviews.author: Clarita

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea, but our bird isn't taking to the pellet thing well. Tried the smaller pellets, and not the larger Zupreem pellets. She seems to like the larger pellets a bit more. Haven't a clue of the flavor. Still a work in progress.
customer_reviews.author: Bert  Weyl

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Parrot Loves
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon Parrot has eaten ZuPreem food & treats since I got him 4 years ago. I love their healthy products. I had never tried the ZuPreem Pure Fun previously so thought we'd give it a try. He loved it! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Frye

customer_reviews.title: My Sun Conure Hated it
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old sun conure has been eating Zupreem Fruit Blend all his life. He also gets plenty of nutritious treats (fruits vegetables, and some safe human food). But he loves his Zupreem Fruit Blend. He hated this one. Foraged. Tasted everything. Tossed each piece. Then walked away. I tried a few days in a row. He just looked at it and then turned away.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee First

customer_reviews.title: Zupreen quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad bash of the Zupreen Pure Fun. The smell, the freshness isn’t there. My birds won’t eat it and this is one of their favorite treats
customer_reviews.author: Ana Downing

customer_reviews.title: Lovevit
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this for my parrot who apparently doesn’t have the bright Amazon colors he should have since his diet needed more nutrition. He doesn’t love it yet but he is much more interested in it then he was the cheap food
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Having not tasted this myself, Billie my Amazon Parrot gets very excited when he gets this in his dish. This has everything a parrot needs, I still give Billie fresh fruit and vegetables for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great food, happy Birds!
customer_reviews.text: All my birds love this food, some dip them in water to moisten the dried fruit, they love it and it last a long time, because it's only supposed to be 30% of there food intake.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Always a great product. Cost was much less than any local ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time. Always a great product. Cost was much less than any local seller. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Newman

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Very good food for your birds. All birds need to be on a pellet food to get all their nutrients and vitamins. My Senegal which is 14 yrs old loves it and will let me know when she wants more. “Yummy “
customer_reviews.author: Debra Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: there waste doesnt stink as bad and they dont waste as ...
customer_reviews.text: the only pellets I will feed to my african greys, there waste doesnt stink as bad and they dont waste as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good pallets with dried vegitables
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont get time to give fresh vegetables to my sun conures.so i bought these to instead. I mix some quantity of this with their regular zupreem pallets
customer_reviews.author: Salman Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: A fun and nutritious way for your parrot to eat the rainbow.
customer_reviews.text: Looks delicious and my Conure seems to be enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Food is very expensive and full of great things. But my birds were not impressed at all unfortunately. They literally threw it at me. I had to mix it with a couple other products and still they threw out the dried fruit and veggies; which is NOT normal for them at all. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Amunet

customer_reviews.title: All peas
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed with this. I bought 2 packs (4 bags) it is ALL peas. I guess I will stick to buying this from PetSmart for a little more so I can see what is in it it more.
customer_reviews.author: lorimartow

customer_reviews.title: Parrot Could Care Less!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think my parrot particularly likes this product. It just stays in her dish until she actually takes it out and drops it to the floor of her cage.
customer_reviews.author: T. N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: My conures don't like pellets but I know it's good for them. This food has pellets and lots of others tidbits that they love, so they're getting a good balance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. O. Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good diet for parrot
customer_reviews.text: My Mexican red head parrot loves me fruits in here. She used to have a bald spot for a few months and we didn't know why. Even the vet wasn't sure about the cause. We switched her to this food, mixing it with some other nuts and seeds. After two months, we could see a big change in the bald spot. The feathers are starting to grow back now. However, she doesn't like the pellets that come with this fruits so it's a bit wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey D.

customer_reviews.title: My bird is picky. But seems to eat some ...
customer_reviews.text: My bird is picky. But seems to eat some of the dried fruit. Won't touch the peppers. The regular zupreem is her normal pellet food. 14 years old a very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Pechner

customer_reviews.title: Amazon parrot gives two wings up
customer_reviews.text: My purple crowned Amazon,Bailey, loves these dried fruit bits and flavored pellets. When I say fruit he comes running and says yum. I add about 1/3 of fruit to his daily maintenance pellets. He is very picky but he took right to his fruity treat.
customer_reviews.author: Wendel Vantine

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good service.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and convenient. This product is not available locally and my bird lives it. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A.

customer_reviews.title: Bruno LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Salomon Island Eclectus named Bruno, he's Very picky about his food But he Loves The Pure Fun
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Our greys really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Our birds can talk, but they can’t type... yet. If they could, it would be: “really like that stuff”.
customer_reviews.author: $Bill

customer_reviews.title: CHEMICALS! natural food covered with chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes awful. I ate an almond out of this mixture and it tasted like a chemical costed bad piece of candy
customer_reviews.author: stargazer11

customer_reviews.title: Fun Food
customer_reviews.text: Food is great I have some picky eaters so they tend to pick through it and only eat what they like. They like the fruit and nuts more so the the dehydrated veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sowell Downum

customer_reviews.title: Finally something for all of them.
customer_reviews.text: My birds really love this. It's hard to find one they will all pick thru. I have a TAG, a CAG, a YNA, and an ekkie. They all have something in this blend that they like.
customer_reviews.author: Adina Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The food I received was rancid and had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: my bird loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: MY GREY LOVES THIS !! he eats harrisons high protein and zupreem fruit blend - this is the perfect difference for him !
customer_reviews.author: afs

customer_reviews.title: Good deal will buy again from this store !!️
customer_reviews.text: Got my product took a little longer than our regular 2 days for prime subscribers but got it!! Fresh! Love the time frame even if was 3 days!!️
customer_reviews.author: JJ Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bird loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Goffins cockatoo loves this food. It is healthier than just seeds and nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Brent from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Parrot loves
customer_reviews.text: Mix this with his routine food for variety. My Cockatoo seems to enjoy the variety.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Birds
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know the flavor. I didn’t buy it to eat. My bird seems to like all but the green ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fresh
customer_reviews.text: My parrots do very well with this food. My Senegal is finicky but does well with this food
customer_reviews.author: Nana22 FL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: African grey loves the treats in his food. We mix a little of this with pellets for a variety
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Gril

customer_reviews.title: My Conure Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My Jenday Conure has pretty much tried every brand of parrot food on the market. He used to toy with his food, spill it everywhere and eat only human food with me! Ever since I switched him to this brand, he absolutely loves it! Now he only pester me when I am eating occasionally :)
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this with other mix. He takes his time eating.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.

customer_reviews.title: A tasty snack For a bird
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh a good variety in my conure loves them.
customer_reviews.author: daniel poindexter

customer_reviews.title: Parrot loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 28 year old parrot really enjoys this and will choose it over his regular food...except the peas, lol.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 42 year old amazon loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: Bird loves this food! We are trying to eliminate as much seed from her diet. She immediately accepted and eats this food easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J

customer_reviews.title: African Grey likes them.
customer_reviews.text: She seems to be enjoying this colorful blend, alternated with her regular diet. She is very picky! If she is happy, I am happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: My bird love this
customer_reviews.text: The bird will pick though it but loves most of it!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Souto

customer_reviews.title: My conure agrees, it is pure fun.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to get here. I forgot I ordered it. This is a treat , so don't feed it exclusively. I give him some every few days and he likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Suedotcom

customer_reviews.title: My African Grey Loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My African grey actually eats this food and doesn't just throw it on the bottom of her cage like other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Birds love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My Sun Conure & pineapple Cheek Conure both love this! Always keep an extra bag in hand so we don’t ever run out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birds
customer_reviews.text: Loved that service was quick and upon opening the package it smelled fresh & bonus..the birds loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Ver good bag for buck
customer_reviews.text: My sun conure only eats these type of pellets and she loves the dried fruit
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad mohedin

customer_reviews.title: My birds favorite food!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making this so easy. I purchase and you deliver! I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Atilla Mitrovich

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious food, delicious seed! Great product, I definitely reccomend it! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BIRD

customer_reviews.title: My parrots will eat this!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky birds actually eat this! Took about a week for them to try it, but my patience was rewarded. I switched from Pretty Bird because they were getting " pretty" expensive with their new pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hahn Mcaw love it.
customer_reviews.text: Kermit is very picky. He loves the Pure fun. It’s variiety keeps him in his bowl for longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love zupreem.. they are recommended by vets and are healthy for your buddies
customer_reviews.author: Ali Orhan

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not so tasty like the ZuPreem fruit pellets
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like this too much. My Amazon likes the ZuPreem fruit pellets and I thought this would be a nice change. She doesnt like it.
customer_reviews.author: My Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mostly a seed/pellet additive. Couldn’t use this as the main diet as it’s just random bits and pieces but it’s a fine addition to other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna L. McKay

customer_reviews.title: What Morgan Likes
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for my Timneh African Grey. It is one of his favorite foods among fresh fruits, vegetables and pellets.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo did not like this one bit. Wasted the entire bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Neither my Amazon or my Cockatoo liked this. They're usually not terribly picky eaters but they just didn't eat this stuff. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Powell

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss with these!
customer_reviews.text: Always a hit! Most food is tossed out! These are spotted and gobbled up quickly .
customer_reviews.author: big pappa

customer_reviews.title: Hope your bird likes chilis
customer_reviews.text: Conure will not eat the chilis - - and there are a lot of them in the bag. She seems to like the rest. Buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Bubba Long

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bird didn't like it and there's no returns. Purchase instead from the pet store, at lest you can return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Our bird loves this food in addition to his normal food mix.
customer_reviews.author: Milos Horvat

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Our Green Cheeked Conure LOVES this as a little addition to her food!
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treat
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves picking through his pellets to get some of these tasty treats. I only use a bit on his daily dose of pellets, but it makes things interesting for him.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bird food
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bird food. Just wish it was in bigger bag and a littlw cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: My parrot loves it
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves it except she leaves all of the peas! Apparently shes not a dry pea eater!
customer_reviews.author: P. Zboray

customer_reviews.title: Good source of treats not main diet
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feed everything in this mix but the value is good for what I pick out for treats.

customer_reviews.title: My cockatoo loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo is a picky eater and loves this food. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly.garden

customer_reviews.title: A good treat
customer_reviews.text: My caique loves this stuff. I only give her a little bit once in a while so it's lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: pitchaj

customer_reviews.title: Zupreem is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I only use Zupreem brand parrot food to add to the diet of my high strung cockatoos. I know I'm not getting a ton of fillers or added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Amari eats it. My small African parrot seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amari eats it. My small African parrot seems to think its OK. Not her first choice, but not her last either. I will buy again, but this 1 will last quite a while.

customer_reviews.title: Rotten pistachios
customer_reviews.text: Every single one of the phistashio is rotten! What a waste of money! Do not recommend!

customer_reviews.title: All I can say our 2 cockatoos love the stuff but though they can say a few ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say our 2 cockatoos love the stuff but though they can say a few words unfortunately the can’t read nor write so you’ll have to take my word for it.

customer_reviews.title: Great nutritional value!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to switch off seed. She loves it. However doesn't eat all the colors. She's funny!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I think this bag is filled with the perfect mixture to feed your bird. There are seeds, dried fruits, and pellets.

customer_reviews.title: She likes them !
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in with her other food. She is a very finicky eater but likes to pick though her seed for the ZuPreem.

customer_reviews.title: Hit with the birds.
customer_reviews.text: Our birds are seed junkies, but love the little bits of fruit in this mixture. A great addition to their diet.

product_meta.title: ZuPreem Pure Fun Bird Food for Parrots and Conures | Blend of Fruit, Natural FruitBlend Pellets, Vegetables, Nuts for African Greys, Senegals, Amazons, Eclectus, Small Cockatoos
product_meta.description: Size:2 lb bag (2-pack)ZuPreem Pure Fun Bird Food for Parrots and Conures, 2 lb bag (2-pack) | Blend of Fruit, Natural FruitBlend Pellets, Vegetables, Nuts for Caiques, African Greys, Senegals, Amazons, Eclectus, Cockatoos
feature_bullets: PREMIUM, POWERFUL BLEND of Fruit, Natural FruitBlend Pellets, vegetables and nuts to help excite and enrich your pet bird.

MADE SPECIFICALLY for Conures, Caiques, African Greys, Senegals, Amazons, Eclectus and Small Cockatoos. This blend includes a delicious mix of right-sized pieces for your bird which helps minimize wasted food.
SATISFY your bird’s playful and fun-loving instincts and help create an interactive activity with each feeding.
ADDS ENRICHING VARIETY to your bird’s weekly food program and may be fed up to 30 percent of the total food your bird eats each week. Keep your bird active, engaged and happy.
CONVERT YOUR BIRD TO A HEALTHIER DIET. Converting your bird to a food that includes pellets is worth the effort for his/her health and wellbeing.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
